Tired of messy Tabs?

Save & Launch lists of tabs with a Single Click

Coming Soon

 

Whyyyyyyy ?


We built TabTrum to address one key problem we all face.


Budget Device 20+ Open Tabs RAM Drained Device Frozen You Sad



With TabTrum, you can
open n tabs (duh),
save them as a Snapshot when you're taking off,
close the browser in peace,
come back and launch all tabs at once !


Coming Soon
